title: Mobile Microlearning Design for ChatGPT Utilization in STEAM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of STEAM education concepts and experience using ChatGPT
context.additional_context: A course focusing on integrating ChatGPT into STEAM education within a mobile-based microlearning environment, where learners collaborate with participants of varying educational levels and conduct survey-based research.

learning_goals: Learners can design STEAM educational content using ChatGPT and generate verifiable learning materials
Learners can evaluate the educational applicability of ChatGPT by analyzing its accuracy and reliability limitations
Learners can analyze the impact of ChatGPT on STEAM education through survey-based research and write a report
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
